Title: Justice
Plot: Tommy copes with a tragedy. Jerry must decide what to do when his wife's condition worsens. Sean has a crisis of faith. Lou learns some shocking facts about Candy. And the crew responds to a multi-level building fire with people trapped inside.
GuestStars: Stephen Beach,  Portia,  Noelle Beck,  Christopher McHale,  Niels Jorgensen,  Julienne Hanzelka Kim,  Mark Mineart,  Darby Gurt,  Peggy Scott,  Bernardo  De Paula,  Brian DeLate,  Olivia Crocicchia,  Thomas Lyon
